```{r}
library(lterdatasampler)
```

```{r}
pie_crab <- pie_crab
pie_crab_summary <- pie_crab %>%
  dplyr::group_by(site) %>%
  dplyr::summarise(mean = round(mean(size), 2),
                   sd = round(sd(size), 2),
                   count = n())
```


```{r}
library(tidyverse)

ggplot(data = pie_crab, aes(x = latitude, y = size)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(caption = "this is my caption")

```
